TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Soit c'est un article ou des histoires que nous traduisons en anglais en pangungusap. Cet outil ne traduit pas mot par mot. TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Parfois, les citations changent au moment du changement en anglais en pangungusap. L'objectif de Sentence Translation est spécifiquement de garder le vrai sens inchangé. Grâce à l'IA avancée, elle ne se contente pas de traduire des phrases, elle affine également le contenu pour répondre à différents publics.

FAQ.question: What is the difference between translation and transliteration?
FAQ.answer: A translation tells you the meaning of words in another language. Google translator, Bing translator, and our own english to pangungusap sentence translation tool, which is free on our website, are some of the prominent translation tools. While a transliteration does not reveal the meaning of the words, it can help you pronounce them correctly. Transliteration changes the letters from one alphabet or language into the corresponding, similar-sounding characters of another alphabet. Therefore, we can say, transliteration changes the letters from one alphabet into the similar-sounding characters of another alphabet. This makes it the simplest and fastest method of typing in pangungusap without practicing any pangungusap keyboard. You can either use the Google input tool for FREE.

FAQ.question: Why do we need translators?
FAQ.answer: The translation is essential for the dissemination of fresh information, knowledge, and ideas around the world. It is vitally necessary to have effective communication amongst people from different cultural backgrounds to be successful. The translation is something that has the potential to alter the course of history through the process of disseminating new information. It is the sole means by which certain people can become acquainted with a variety of works that will help them to broaden their understanding of the world.
